Mod4_Description: {c_important}Iron Skin's{/c} {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} absorbs {c_number}[{SF_3} * 100|%|]{/c} more of your Maximum Life.
Mod5_Description: While {c_important}Iron Skin{/c} is active, Heal for {c_number}[{SF_7} * 100|%|]{/c} of the {c_important}{u}Barrier's{/u}{/c} original amount as Life per second.
Mod6_Description: {c_important}Iron Skin{/c} also grants {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([{fortified:PAYLOAD_FORTIFY_BASE}|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.Â Double this amount if cast while below {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|%|]{/c} Life.
